Established in early 2002.
EFTERLYST started out releasing
hot price swesubbed SVCDs. By time
we suprised our Swedish viewers
by releasing high quality pre-store
top movies.

Time goes and DVDR is more popular
than ever. We decided to join the
PAL DVDR scene. We left SWESUB behind
and apologies to all our fans ;(

At the moment, we can be proud of
having released most DVDRs in
the world!
